languages.text: "Я затянусь палочкой лхо. Это будет сигналом к бою".
languages.translation_comment: в FW_BackToBody_dialogue этот сигнал-ансвер будет показываться по данному этюду

traits.locale_text: "Я затянусь лхо. Это будет сигналом к бою".

languages.translation_comment: в FW_BackToBody_dialogue этот сигнал-ансвер будет показываться по данному этюду

languages.text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."
languages.original_text: "Я затянусь палочкой лхо. Это будет сигналом к бою".

traits.locale_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."
"I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."
"I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."
"I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."
"I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."
"I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

languages.text: "Ich ziehe an einem Lho-Stab. Das ist das Signal zum Angriff."
languages.original_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ziehe an einem Lho-Stab. Das ist das Signal zum Angriff."

languages.text: « Quand je tirerai une bouffée de cigalho, ce sera le signal de passer à l'attaque. »
languages.original_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je tirerai une bouffée de cigalho, ce sera le signal de passer à l'attaque. »

languages.text: 「ルホスティックを一服する。それが攻撃の合図だ」
languages.original_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

traits.locale_text: 「ルホスティックを一服する。それが攻撃の合図だ」

languages.text: «Daré una calada a un cigarrillo de lho. Esa será la señal».
languages.original_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

traits.locale_text: «Daré una calada a un cigarrillo de lho. Esa será la señal».

languages.text: “我到时候会说想抽根麻烟，这就是发动攻击的信号。”
languages.original_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

traits.locale_text: “我到时候会说想抽根麻烟，这就是发动攻击的信号。”

languages.text: "Liho dalından bir fırt çekeceğim. Saldırı işaretimiz bu olsun."
languages.original_text: "I will take a drag on a lho-stick. That will be the signal to strike."

traits.locale_text: "Liho dalından bir fırt çekeceğim. Saldırı işaretimiz bu olsun."
